column4: i use a lexmark printer and i needed to install libstdc++5 which isn't in 10.04 repos
is anyone aware of Lucid Lynx requiring certain packages to be installed for printers to be detected like it used to?
my old epson 425 has been detected and installed on many ubuntu releases. Lucid Lynx is the first release nto to detect and install the drivers
then i suggest you find out why by checking what it requires in the openprinting site
